Uses of Package
edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos

Classes in edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos used by edu.washington.cs.ds.jeremyc.paxos
BallotNumber
          The ballot number is comprised of the unique ID of the member initiating the ballot (to gurantee global uniqueness of ballot numbers) and an integer which is incremented as subsequent ballots are issued for the same decree by the same host.
Decree
          A small sample of something that we might store in a distributed fashion.
Ledger
          Entries made in indelable ink.
Ledger.LedgerAccessor
          Sleepycat JE Persistence implementation for accessing Ledger entries by decree number.
Member.BallotProcessor
          A thread that initiates action based on data in Paper and Ledger.
MemberID
          The ID of a member of the paxos parliament.
Message
          The general object conveyed in communication.
Message.Type
          A message type enumeration, corresponding to the messages described in Appendix A1 of Lamport's "Part-time Parliament" with the following two exceptions: The NEW message is used to ask a parliament member to initiate a new decree.
Paper
          Names and descriptions taken directly from Appendix A1 of Lamport's "Part-time Parliament", items which are written on a piece of paper.
Paper.PaperAccessor
          Sleepycat JE Persistence implementation for accessing Paper entries by decree number.
Paper.Status
           
Storage
          Container of Sleepycat JE entities that must be defined.
